lead_paragraph: A former JPMorgan Chase & Co investment adviser was sentenced to five years in prison on Tuesday after admitting that he stole at least $20 million from client accounts to fund a gambling addiction and to trade in stock options.

headline.main: Ex-JPMorgan Adviser Gets Five Years in Prison for Embezzling $20 Million
headline.print_headline: Ex-JPMorgan Adviser Gets Five Years in Prison for Embezzling $20 Million

snippet: A former JPMorgan Chase & Co investment adviser was sentenced to five years in prison on Tuesday after admitting that he stole at least $20 million from client accounts to fund a gambling addiction and to trade in stock options.
